scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: In this letter, 1979 Feb 3, from Erskine Caldwell, Scottsdale, AZ, to Jakie Pruett, Caldwell replies that he never really had heroes either in his early or later years, but that he had always admired writers and authors generally, and wanted to be one himself.
